project.description: This is the assembly Apache NiFi

configuration.name: nifi
configuration.description: Apache NiFi is dataflow system based on the Flow-Based Programming concepts.
configuration.license: Apache License, Version 2.0 and others (see included LICENSE file)

preinstallScriptlet.script: /usr/bin/getent group nifi >/dev/null || /usr/sbin/groupadd -r nifi; /usr/bin/getent passwd nifi >/dev/null || /usr/sbin/useradd -r -g nifi -d /opt/nifi -s /sbin/nologin -c "NiFi System User" nifi
